sequence:
Ashigara, Advance!

<size=45>Chapter 4 - Ashigara, Why do you Fight?</size>

scripts.say: One day, at the training grounds
I would like to extend my gratitude to everyone in the Sakura Fleet for coming to join us in this joint exercise.
If anything, we are the ones who should be grateful. Through this joint exercise, we hope to be able to learn much from the Royal Navy.
I hope that there will be many more opportunities for us to cooperate in the future!
If memory doth serve me properly, thou art Ashigara of the Sakura Empire?
Huh? Uhh, um, yes ma'am!
(She seems to be none other than... Royal Navy Battleship, Duke of York)
Rumors of thee hast reached mine ears, but thou shines even brighter in person. Sublime, how mysterious thou art!
(Is... is she complimenting me?)
Th-thank you very much...
Hehehe, indeed. But I must ask of thee. For whom dost thou fight? One who fights only for oneself shines not, but rather sputters out.
(Wh-what does she mean? Is she asking about why I work hard?)
Um... though this is just an exercise, I am a representative of the Sakura Empire, so...
"Spare no expense, and give everything you have." This way, I can fulfill my obligations to everyone in the Sakura-
Obligations? Hmm... an answer befitting an honor student. But ultimately, a trifling, meaningless answer.
What doth lie beyond thy obligations? What of your Elatus, the uplifting of thy heart from fulfilling thy desires?
(I-I've never heard these words before...)
That's enough, it's in poor taste to bully a straightforward and pure girl.
Don't take her too seriously. That's just how she talks. York, don't we have somewhere we need to be?
Tsk... Wales, how ubiquitous thou art.
Duke of York and Prince of Wales leave the training area together.
(Phew... I-I'm saved...)
(Uplifting my heart? Fulfilling my desires? Was she talking about what I really want deep down?)
(Do I really have something like that...?)
